The biggest gripe I have of ntr is how repetitive it is. Guy with faithful girl -> girl meets guy with bigger dick -> girl in (very) short denial -> girl succumbs to dick and becomes submissive -> original partner becomes a cuck. It basically never changes. I say basically because I've found some that actually stood out like:
1. It starts the same but when he catches his pregnant wife cheating on him and admitting that the kid ain't his, he Fucking stabbed the other guy and killed his wife in cold blood.
2. Himekishi no tame. At the near end there was a psychological war and he could've won if he believed in his princess.
3. Reverse ntr (gender)
4. Deserved ntr ( the guy cheats and somebody swoops down and takes her away)
5. You did not notice who actually got ntr'ed until you read the full story and really digest it ( Fucking forgot the title)
6. The husband is dead but not departed
7. Technically
